bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with qi mi 氣秘 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ju 橘 quoting YSJSF Da bian men 大便門 : 治氣秘 , 老人虛弱人皆可服 , “It cures qi closure. Old people and those in a state of depletion and weakness can ingest them” , writes: 老人氣閟 , “Old people with qi closure ”. Qi bi 氣痹 , qi blockage [2]

Pathological Condition of bi bing 痹病 , blockage disease, brought forth by emotional factors. Zhong zang jing 中藏經 Mj: 氣痹者，愁憂思喜怒過多…壅而不散，則痛；流而不聚，則麻 , “In the case of qi blockage , one has excessively given oneself to emotions such as sorrow, grief, pondering, joy and anger…[the qi] is obstructed and fails to dissipate, andthis results in pain. When it flows off and does not collect, this results in hemp[like numbness]”.
